# Summary

[Vacancy chains](../aggregators/move-out-chains.qmd) from a single condo tower can spread across a wide area.

# Details

In a case study of a 512-unit condominium tower in Honolulu, vacancy chains averaged 8.7 km, with some vacancy chains including movers from the continental US [@FangKimTyndall2025].
